results.title: Simvastatin attenuates the additive effects of TNF-alpha and IL-18 on the connexin 43 up-regulation and over-proliferation of cultured aortic smooth muscle cells.
results.text_hl: The aims of this study were to examine the regulatory role of @GENE_IL18 @GENE_3606 @@@interleukin-18@@@ (@GENE_IL18 @GENE_3606 @@@IL-18@@@) in the @GENE_GJA1 @GENE_2697 @@@connexin 43@@@ (@GENE_GJA1 @GENE_2697 @@@Cx43@@@) and the proliferation of cultured aortic smooth muscle cells (SMCs) as well as to elucidate the underlying therapeutic mechanism of @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@Vytorin@@@ therapy significantly alleviated high-@CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ diet-induced @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@, suppressed @<m>DISEASE_Hyperplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006965 @@@neointimal hyperplasia@@@, macrophage infiltration, and @GENE_GJA1 @GENE_2697 @@@Cx43@@@ and @GENE_IL18 @GENE_3606 @@@IL-18@@@ expression in @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbit@@@ aortic walls.

citations.NLM: Lin YC, Chiang CH, Chang LT, Sun CK, Leu S, Shao PL, Hsieh MC, Tsai TH, Chua S, Chung SY, Kao YH, Yip HK. Simvastatin attenuates the additive effects of TNF-alpha and IL-18 on the connexin 43 up-regulation and over-proliferation of cultured aortic smooth muscle cells. Cytokine. 2013 Jun;62(3):341-51. PMID: 23618917
